name: Accordion FAQ plugin
author: maheshpatel

sections.description:
This plugin provide FAQ’s as accordion type with shortcode tag in taxonony/category page,directly take shortcode put in any page,post and widget.

Features of this plugin.
* Unlimited FAQs and Taxonomy/category
* Responsive FAQs
* Compatible with WordPress standard themes
* Taxonomy/Categorized display of FAQS
* Displaying question and answer based on accordion.
* Unlimited Support for comments/Query.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress admin.
  3. Add Taxonomy/Category to quick faq plugin.
  4. Add Faq and select Taxonomy/category to display page/post.
sections.faq:
1. Can I create multiple Faq’s?
    Ans. Yes, You can create multiple Faq’s.

short_description: Faq plugin provide you accordion with simple,easy,best,quick and multiple faq.
